description.en: Tacos al Pastor - a classic Mexico dish prepared for home cooks.
description.zh: Tacos al Pastor - 经典的Mexico菜，适合家庭烹饪。
description.sv: Tacos al Pastor - en klassisk Mexicorätt anpassad för hemanvändning.

en: 300 g beef
1 pc onion
2 cloves garlic
30 ml olive oil
zh: 300 g 牛肉
1 pc 洋葱
2 cloves 大蒜
30 ml 橄榄油
sv: 300 g nötkött
1 pc lök
2 cloves vitlök
30 ml olivolja

en: Prepare ingredients: 300 g beef, 1 pc onion, 2 cloves garlic, 30 ml olive oil.
If required, marinate or season the main ingredients for 15–30 minutes.
Preheat pan or oven to 200°C when appropriate.
Cook Tacos al Pastor using the suitable method (grill, sauté, simmer or bake) until properly done.
Taste and adjust seasoning, rest if needed, then serve warm.
zh: 准备食材: 300 g beef, 1 pc onion, 2 cloves garlic, 30 ml olive oil.
如需，可将主要食材腌制或调味15–30分钟。
如适用，将锅或烤箱预热至200°C。
烹饪 Tacos al Pastor using the suitable method (grill, sauté, simmer or bake) until properly done.
尝味并调整调味，必要时静置片刻，趁热上桌。
sv: Förbered ingredienserna: 300 g beef, 1 pc onion, 2 cloves garlic, 30 ml olive oil.
Om nödvändigt, marinera eller krydda huvudingredienserna i 15–30 minuter.
Förvärm panna eller ugn till 200°C vid behov.
Tillaga Tacos al Pastor using the suitable method (grill, sauté, simmer or bake) until properly done.
Smaka av och justera kryddning, vila om nödvändigt och servera varm.

en: Prepare ingredients: 300 g beef, 1 pc onion, 2 cloves garlic, 30 ml olive oil.
If required, marinate or season the main ingredients for 15–30 minutes.
Preheat pan or oven to 200°C when appropriate.
Cook Provoleta using the suitable method (grill, sauté, simmer or bake) until properly done.
Taste and adjust seasoning, rest if needed, then serve warm.
zh: 准备食材: 300 g beef, 1 pc onion, 2 cloves garlic, 30 ml olive oil.
如需，可将主要食材腌制或调味15–30分钟。
如适用，将锅或烤箱预热至200°C。
烹饪 Provoleta using the suitable method (grill, sauté, simmer or bake) until properly done.
尝味并调整调味，必要时静置片刻，趁热上桌。
sv: Förbered ingredienserna: 300 g beef, 1 pc onion, 2 cloves garlic, 30 ml olive oil.
Om nödvändigt, marinera eller krydda huvudingredienserna i 15–30 minuter.
Förvärm panna eller ugn till 200°C vid behov.
Tillaga Provoleta using the suitable method (grill, sauté, simmer or bake) until properly done.
Smaka av och justera kryddning, vila om nödvändigt och servera varm.
